poem:
Title: "Voice of the Valley"

Beyond dusty escarpments, a valley breathes,
animates wildlife, a vast ballet of beasts.
Underneath, a quiet power awaits,
Kenya's vow to a cleaner slate.
Pink flamingos gossip in reflected light,
guardians of our profound plight.
A world of beauty, of strength, of awe,
found beneath a Rift Valley's raw core.
